title: Looking at the wild
brief_description: Harry Butler shows aspiring naturalists some of the simpler but fundamental techniques necessary to enjoy more fully a natural bush environment. Harry comments on the dress and basic equipment; demonstrates simple pit-traps and more complex fauna traps; and stresses the need for interest and enquiry in the natural bush environment.
